title: Is Riot trying to troll me or tilt me!

embed.description: Hacks4Dayz / Bronze 4 64LP / 44W 41L Win Ratio 52% / Garen - 28W 26L Win Ratio 52%, Shen - 5W 5L Win Ratio 50%, Ornn - 3W 4L Win Ratio 43%, Master Yi - 3W 0L Win Ratio 100%, Warwick - 0W 3L Win Ratio 0%

body:
My OPGG said it all.
I get promos.. In fact I have gotten it 6 times with in 24 hours. I mean really. 5 times I have gotten promos. 5 times now I have gotten feeders / trolls / toxic people that would rather rage at one another then play the game.

I have a 52% win rate. But soon as I get promos.. I ONLY NEED 1 DAMN GAME! I get trolls. This is starting to make me think because I got a 10 game chat ban. 
Is Riot trying to tilt me? I mean really. I can win 2 to put me back into promos. But I cannot win 1 game to maintained the promo.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}



Edited

6 times now.

I have seen a lot of people say things like this. I just hate people that think they are so great because of a ranking.
I havent done rank. But in SC2 when it first came out I was Diamond. Then in S2 I was Diamond again. But I never told anyone of a lower tier " Bronze mentality " 

They have just as much right as others to say what they want from a game.

Lol ok just saying ur mentality bad :) that’s all ... your definition of toxic seems to be a lot different from mine but that’s ok we can have different views on toxicity.

I was merely saying that blaming your teams all the time isn’t the best idea imo.. you can really improve as a player if you accept your mistakes and not always blame people ... when you lose think about what you could have done better to win the game not what your teammates did wrong to lose the game.... 

I will not result to calling you ‘bronze trash’ because you are not.. you are merely players in the transitional period of ranked and I think you can both benifit from my advice as it will definitely get you out of the depths of elo hell (assuming you want to climb).

I’m nowhere near pro for the record I’m just a trashy plat player and I did look at your history and if you want my honest opinion it is all good but there is room for improvement definitely whether it be less deaths or builds in situational games that could possibly have resulted in a win in losing games... but yes overall your kda winrate looks good and if you continue you can def climb.... 

Please refrain from lashing out at me just trying to help. :)

But the fact remains.. It seems like Riot is trying to tilt me because I ggot a 10 game chat ban. I have had 10 accounts go through this. 10 game chat ban turns into a prema really quick. For the smallest of things.
The fact I got a 10 game chat ban then a 2 day losing streak. Then promos and then loss due to troll's / toxic people / Feeders. Made me wonder. 
But now I regret even coming to the forums in anyway. So congratz brah. You have one less bronze on the forums.
